about_the_game:
How Little We Wait is a classic Point & Click Adventure. You will need to uncover the mystery behind the two strangers you meet who are both imprisoned by their past mistakes. Escape the room that binds you to the past by collecting and combining the scattered items around this otherworldly room that you find yourself trapped in. Time is stuck in a stasis, forever looping. You only have seconds before time resets and the sins of the past are repeated. Opening both doors is the only way to reveal the full truth behind the two strangers. Can you escape with limited time?



This game is intended to be beaten within a fast time limit. Repetition and quick learning are key factors needed to successfully uncover the truth behind the situation you are caught in. The full truth will only be awarded to those who uncover every possible clue in the room.

content_descriptors.notes: Depictions of blood and violence. References to sex. Smoking.
